title: Apple working on iPhones with touchless control, curved screen - Bbg
text:
(Reuters) - Apple Inc is working on touchless gesture control and curved screens for future iPhones, Bloomberg reported, citing people with knowledge of the matter.
Silhouette of mobile user is seen next to a screen projection of Apple logo in this picture illustration taken March 28, 2018. REUTERS/Dado Ruvic/Illustration The technology may not be ready for consumers for at least two years, if Apple chooses to go forward with it, the report screen said.
Apple did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
Reporting by Sonam Rai in Bengaluru; Editing by Arun Koyyur
